title: Looking for team to play with (S1 sup main)
body: Looking for some people to play with to have a 5 man. Im a silver 1 support main with my best picks being Rakan, Brauma and Karma (but I can play any support). I can also play adc if needed. Message here or add Briolu if interested.

replies.body: Sounds good man, I wont be able to play till tomorrow night thought but Ill be free all day tomorrow üòÅ
